import React from 'react' import { useMediaQuery } from 'react-responsive' function Hero() { const isTablet = useMediaQuery({ query: '(max-width: 1410px)'}) const isWideScreen = useMediaQuery({ query: '(min-width: 1411px)'}) return (
{isWideScreen &&
